name: Color Banding Detection
description: Detects posterization and quantization artifacts in smooth gradients. AI images may show subtle color banding due to limited color depth in generated content.
algorithm: Gradient Step Detection + Banding Ratio Analysis
mechanism: Analyzes smooth gradient regions for discrete color steps by comparing adjacent pixel differences. Banding indicates quantization from AI generation or heavy compression.
parameters: Step detection threshold: 2, Gradient range: 3-40, Window: 5 pixels
useCase: Detecting color quantization artifacts in AI-generated images
